doc:
Doug Davidson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doug_Davidson 0 Douglas Donald Davidson (born October 24, 1954 in Glendale, California) is an American television actor. He portrayed private investigator Paul Williams on the CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless from May 1978 until 2018, which made him the series' longest-serving cast member. Douglas_Donald_Davidson ( born October_24 , 1954 in Glendale , California ) is an_American_television_actor . He portrayed private_investigator_Paul_Williams on the_CBS_soap_opera The_Young and the_Restless from May_1978 until 2018 , which made him the_series_'_longest-serving_cast_member .
